properties.entry: On this page you can import existing users from an LDAP server into the U-QASAR platform.
In order to start import of LDAP users, you first have to retrieve a list of existing LDAP users and then select the ones to be imported.
The retrieval of users will be performed according to the LDAP settings for the user mapping
(click here to revise or change these settings)

Please note, that certain LDAP-users may not be imported in case another user in the U-QASAR platform exists, that has the same eMail address OR the same username as the LDAP user to be imported. Those non-importable users
will be marked as such by color and a curresponding pointer.
Retrieve Users from LDAP for selection
